code: import React from"react";import{useChannelStore}from"../stores/channels";export var useActiveChannel=function useActiveChannel(){var activeChannelId=useChannelStore(function(state){return state.activeChannelId;});var channels=useChannelStore(function(state){return state.channels;});return React.useMemo(function(){return channels.find(function(channel){return channel.id===activeChannelId;});},[channels,activeChannelId]);};
